# embedclipimgtobase64md

Converts image(PNG) in clipboard to a ready-to-paste text format for markdown files. [Like so](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Egezenn/Miscellaneous-scripts-and-such/refs/heads/main/Python/embedclipimgasbase64md/readme.md):

![I guess it doesn't work on GitHub anymore?](data:image/png;base64,)

Build via: `pyinstaller embedclipimgasbase64md.py --onefile`

might improve, might not
